title: "Artificial intelligence can analyze eye scans to identify patients at high risk of heart attack"
excerpt: "Scientists have developed an artificial intelligence (AI) system that can analyze eye scans taken during a routine visit to an optician or eye clinic and identify patients at a high risk of a heart attack."
